tag_to_content.h2_1: Powering innovation in real estate technology
tag_to_content.h2_2: Powering innovation in real estate technology
tag_to_content.p_0: We de-risk investments and maximize returns by building meaningful partnerships our companies and key industry players within the world’s largest verticals.
tag_to_content.p_1: We have created a unique network of executives, entrepreneurs, thought-leaders and individual practitioners for portfolio companies to navigate and accelerate growth in these verticals.
tag_to_content.p_2: We seek to define and deliver the future of the world’s largest industries by being a catalyst for new technologies, new opportunities, and new talent.
tag_to_content.p_3: Our mission is to define and deliver the future of the world’s largest industry by being a catalyst for emerging technologies, new opportunities, and top talent.  We invest in ideas and ambitious teams looking to scale across the real estate, financial, insurance and home service verticals.
tag_to_content.p_4: Backed by the National Association of REALTORS®, we fuel success for our companies through unparalleled access to the global marketplace and a thriving community of industry executives, entrepreneurs and practitioners.

tag_to_content.title: The strategic investor for real estate - Second Century Ventures
tag_to_content.h1_1: The strategic investor for real estate
tag_to_content.p_0: Second Century Ventures brings a highly collaborative approach to venture capital.  In addition to capital investments, we provide unparalleled market expertise through strategic partnerships, our diversely skilled team, and access to a rapidly growing global community of entrepreneurs and practitioners. We fuel innovation through investment, people and technology.
tag_to_content.p_1: We are backed by the National Association of REALTORS® – a 1.4M member strong trade association with 100 bilateral partnerships across 85 countries.
tag_to_content.p_2: We are an early to mid-stage technology fund seeking investment opportunities in proven enterprises that will drive industry growth, enable new usage models and advance industry standards. SCV prefers SaaS companies generally focused on big data applications, digital media, fintech and business services that can span multiple verticals and geographies.
tag_to_content.p_3: Second Century Ventures invests in strong teams and technologies with the potential to serve multiple industries. We are round-agnostic, favoring investments in organizations with strong market traction and proof of product market fit.
tag_to_content.p_4: As a strategic investor, SCV provides unparalleled value within the real estate vertical. We take a long-term approach to investing – where each new addition is considered part of the family – with access to all the tools available at our disposal.
tag_to_content.p_5: SCV’s growth accelerator, REACH, provides a program and pathway for earlier stage companies or those new to the real estate vertical and its adjacent industries. Learn more about the REACH program below.
tag_to_content.h4_0: NAR REACH is the #1 scale up program for growing technology companies seeking to serve the real estate industry.
tag_to_content.p_6: In 2013, SCV created REACH, a hands-on growth program to help launch and accelerate technology companies into the marketplace.  To date, REACH has graduated more than 80 companies, opened a program dedicated to technology for the Commercial RE sector (REACH Commercial), and further expanded its global presence with three new programs based outside the U.S. (REACH Australia, REACH Canada, and REACH UK).
tag_to_content.h4_1: To learn more or submit an application for REACH, visit narreach.com

tag_to_content.title: Let’s Connect - Second Century Ventures
tag_to_content.p_0: If you feel your business would be a good fit with our investment strategy, we’d love to hear from you.
tag_to_content.p_1: A reference or a referral is a great way to connect with us, otherwise please feel welcome to send your investment materials to the address noted below and a member of our team will reach out at our earliest availability.
tag_to_content.p_2: To submit your business for an investment consideration, please send your executive summary and investment presentation to hello@SecondCenturyVentures.com.

tag_to_content.title: Leaders, Collaborators, Innovators - Second Century Ventures
tag_to_content.p_0: Our talented team of trusted entrepreneurs and investors share a passion for innovating the global real estate industry.  We love to scale businesses, to serve industry practitioners, and to make our company’s journey as enjoyable as possible along the way.
